snippet: The economy “expanded at a modest to moderate pace” from late November through the end of December, the Fed said in its beige book business survey.
abstract: Survey of regional economic conditions in Federal Reserve's 12 districts finds the economy 'expanded at a modest to moderate pace' from late November through the end of December.
lead_paragraph: The economy “expanded at a modest to moderate pace” from late November through the end of December, the Fed said in its beige book business survey.

headline.seo: Economy Grew Modestly Last Month, Fed Report Says
headline.main: As Economy Grows, Jobs Are Still Scarce, Fed Says
headline.print_headline: As Economy Grows, Jobs Are Still Scarce, Fed Says
